question: I'm a part-time employee.  What are my coverage options?
text:
I'm a part-time employee.  What are my coverage options?
          
        
Pennie is a great source of coverage for part-time employees. If your employer doesn't offer you insurance coverage, or if they offer coverage that does not meet affordability or certain minimum coverage standards, you may be able to access coverage through Pennie. Make sure to apply and enroll in coverage through Pennie during Open Enrollment, which takes place November 1, 2020  January 15, 2021. By submitting a Pennie application, you'll find out if you are:


Eligible to purchase health coverage through Pennie with savings on your monthly premiums and out-of-pocket costs for healthcare services based on your household size and income.


Potentially eligible for no-cost Medicaid (Medical Assistance) coverage, based on your income and other factors.
